formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: WLST Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST. i.e: '/path/to/wlst.cmd' or 'wlst.sh'.

formElement.label: Domain Directory:
formElement.documentation: Name of the domain directory from which you want to create the template.

formElement.label: Template Name:
formElement.documentation: Name (use .jar extension) and location of the domain template to store the domain configuration information. A domain template is a JAR file that contains domain configuration documents, applications, security data, startup scripts, and other information needed to create a WebLogic domain.
